title: Gluten free New York style baked cheesecake
ingredients: ['230g gluten-free sweet oat biscuits, crushed', '50g crushed pecans (optional)', '50g butter, melted', '900g cream cheese, at room temperature', '6 large eggs', '300ml soured cream', '2 tablespoons cornflour', '1 tablespoon lemon juice (about 1/2 a lemon)', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract (with seeds, if possible)', '300g caster sugar']
